overview.title: Comprehensive Primary Care
overview.description: Our general medicine department provides comprehensive healthcare services for adults, focusing on prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of common medical conditions with personalized patient care.

doctor.name: Dr. Sunil Jagtap
doctor.title: General Medicine Department
doctor.message: At our general medicine department, we believe in providing personalized care that addresses not just the symptoms, but the whole person. Our team is dedicated to delivering world-class medical care with compassion and excellence.
doctor.info: Dr. Sumeet Jagtap is a General Physician and Internal Medicine in Satara Road, Chikhli and has an experience of 12 years in these fields. Dr. Sumeet Jagtap practices at Sai Sneh Hospital & Diagnostic Center Pvt. Ltd in Satara Road, Chikhli. He completed MBBS from Maharashtra Universtity of Health Sciences, Nashik in 2013 and MD - General Medicine from Bharati Vidyapeeth's Medical College, Chikhli in 2018.Some of the services provided by the doctor are: GENERAL MEDICINE,GENERAL PHYSICIAN,Gastroentrology,OBSTETRICS & GYNAECOLOGY and Cardiology etc.

team.description: Our multidisciplinary team includes general physicians, internists, family medicine specialists, and dedicated nursing staff.

treatments.name: Preventive Health Checkups
treatments.description: Comprehensive health screenings to detect and prevent diseases early.

treatments.name: Chronic Disease Management
treatments.description: Specialized care for diabetes, hypertension, and other chronic conditions.

treatments.name: Acute Illness Treatment
treatments.description: Immediate care for infections, fever, and other acute medical conditions.

technologies.name: Artis-Zeego Endovascular Surgical C-Arm
technologies.description: Advanced surgical imaging system for precise interventional procedures

technologies.name: 256 Slice CT
technologies.description: High-resolution computed tomography for detailed diagnostic imaging

technologies.name: 3.0 Tesla MRI
technologies.description: Powerful magnetic resonance imaging for exceptional anatomical detail

testimonials.name: Rajesh Sharma
testimonials.quote: The care I received at the general medicine department was exceptional. Dr. Jagtap and the team made my treatment journey comfortable and successful.

testimonials.name: Priya Patel
testimonials.quote: I was anxious about my health screening, but the medical team's expertise and compassionate care put me at ease. I'm grateful for their support.

testimonials.name: Amit Kumar
testimonials.quote: State-of-the-art facilities and world-class medical care. The follow-up care has been thorough and personal. Highly recommended!

overview.title: Advanced Cardiac Care
overview.description: Our cardiology department provides comprehensive heart care using state-of-the-art technology and expert medical professionals. We specialize in both preventive and interventional cardiology.

doctor.name: Dr. Sunil Jagtap
doctor.title: Cardiology Department
doctor.message: At our cardiology department, we believe in providing personalized care that addresses not just the symptoms, but the whole person. Our team is dedicated to delivering world-class cardiac care with compassion and excellence.
doctor.info: Dr. Sunil Jagtap is the owner of Sai Sneh Hospital & Diagnostic Centre Pvt Ltd. He practices as a Homeopathy doctor in the Hospital.

team.description: Our multidisciplinary team includes cardiologists, cardiac surgeons, interventional specialists, and dedicated nursing staff.

treatments.name: Angioplasty & Stenting
treatments.description: Minimally invasive procedure to open blocked arteries and restore blood flow to the heart.

treatments.name: Bypass Surgery
treatments.description: Surgical procedure to create alternate pathways for blood flow around blocked arteries.

treatments.name: Cardiac Catheterization
treatments.description: Diagnostic procedure to examine heart function and blood vessel conditions.
